title: "AMERICAN IDOL" Logoytpe / It's not Kaufmann! But what is it?
content:
Anyone knows what font they used to design the “AMERICAN IDOL” logo and all its sister logos?

Please check: [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Idol\_series#Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080406044302/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Idol_series#Logo)

They say its kaufmann! But when you check the German “R” or German “S” its different from kaufmann

thanks. fllody

 [‹ Need help with font on flyer](http://web.archive.org/web/20080406044302/http:/typophile.com/node/42334 "Go to previous forum topic") [Serif to work with Flama ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080406044302/http:/typophile.com/node/42205 "Go to next forum topic")

comments.content:
fllody, the logos are based on Kaufmann ... you can see above that the German logo  
has been slightly customized. (maybe in KidPix 2.0) :P
They definitely don’t share many similarities. I agree that Kaufmann is not the right font.

\> They say its kaufmann!

Not any more they don’t.

It’s not a font.  
Looks like it was hand-written and they used the same vectorized S in the final design.
